entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:25 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
